title: 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT 3rd Floor $1,300
map_address: Johnson Court near North Main Street
posting_body: ['1 BEDROOM APARTMENT 3RD FLOOR', '$1,300 P/M', 'AVAILABLE AUGUST 15, 2022 (MAYBE SOONER)', 'FIRST & LAST PAID UPON LEASE', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT CAN BE A SCHEDULED PAYMENT', 'VOUCHER/ HOUSING ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS ACCEPTED', 'NO SMOKING (INCLUDES VAPING AND MARIJUANA USE ON THE PREMISES)', 'NO PETS', 'ONE OFF-STREET TENANT PARKING SPOT (ALL OTHERS AND ADDITIONAL VEHICLES WILL BE TOWED)', 'THE UNIT IS RECENTLY RENOVATED WITH MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY KEEPING UTILITY BILLS TO A MINIMUM.', 'OPEN CONCEPT KITCHEN/LIVING/ DINING SPACE, 1 BEDROOM, 1 BATHROOM, HEAT/ AIR CONDITIONING AND BALCONY.', 'COIN OPERATED LAUNDRY IN THE BASEMENT', 'PROPERTY IS THREE FAMILY WITH ONE APARTMENT ON EACH FLOOR.', 'UNIT WILL BE VACANT AUGUST 1, 2022', 'VIEWINGS ARE PRESENTLY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY', 'PLEASE REPLY VIA EMAIL FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION AND TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING']
